casebody.data:
CLEMMONS
v.
SECURITAS, et al. No. 324P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 11, 2007. Dalton G. Blair, Charlotte, for Securitas, Inc., et al. Travis Payne, Charlotte, for Clemmons.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of July 2007 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of July 2007."
